name: @wdio-e2e/tauri-webkit
description: E2E tests for Tauri WebKitWebDriver detection and installation

scripts.docker:build:all: pnpm docker:build:ubuntu-base && pnpm docker:build:ubuntu-with && pnpm docker:build:fedora-base && pnpm docker:build:fedora-with
scripts.docker:test:ubuntu-base: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/../../..:/workspace -w /workspace webkit-test:ubuntu-base bash -c 'pnpm install && cd e2e/wdio/tauri-webkit && pnpm test:base'
scripts.docker:test:ubuntu-with: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/../../..:/workspace -w /workspace webkit-test:ubuntu-with-webkit bash -c 'pnpm install && cd e2e/wdio/tauri-webkit && pnpm test:existing'
scripts.docker:test:fedora-base: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/../../..:/workspace -w /workspace webkit-test:fedora-base bash -c 'pnpm install && cd e2e/wdio/tauri-webkit && pnpm test:base'
scripts.docker:test:fedora-with: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/../../..:/workspace -w /workspace webkit-test:fedora-with-webkit bash -c 'pnpm install && cd e2e/wdio/tauri-webkit && pnpm test:existing'
